job_details.degree_required: B.S. degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or related field

jd: From: Sakshi Tyagi, GVR INFOTEK LLC sakshi.tyagi@gvrinfotek.com Reply to: sakshi.tyagi@gvrinfotek.com Title : Sr. Database Administrator ModelerThe candidate preferred local to Oklahoma - with LinkedIn The Database Administrator (DBA) is responsible for developing, testing, improving, and maintaining new and existing databases to help users retrieve data effectively. The DBA will work closely with developers to ensure system consistency and will also collaborate with administrators and clients to provide technical support and understand new data requirements. Communication and organization skills are keys for this position, along with a problem-solution attitude. Requirements:- B.S. degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or related field and eight plus years of solid experience as an application Data Base Administrator.- Knowledge and experience with Oracle Database Appliance- Proficient knowledge of Oracle, SQL, PL/SQL, and RAC.Contact at : sakshi.tyagi@gvrinfotek.com
